LEDI.Name: Desert Storm
LEDI.Message: The battle begins shortly after dawn.

LEDI.Name: Chute Lite
LEDI.Message: To get the goody in the middle you must jump on it.  The hidden transporters take you to the closest corner...

LEDI.Name: Bermuda
LEDI.Message: Many a HECTOR has been known to disappear in the triangle.

LEDI.Name: SpaceWalk
LEDI.Message: One small step for a HECTOR, one big step for HECTOR-kind.

LEDI.Name: Glass Ceiling
LEDI.Message: Don't let the glass ceilings impede your quest for the top.
